sentences.en: Do you know that I should have had a bailiff and a protest after me?
sentences.cn: 法院的执达吏快要把人家告发我的拒绝付款状给我送来了.

sentences.en: If a bailiff - hand with the portability of the old things, that life is a major blessing.
sentences.cn: 如果真有执子之手与子携老之事, 那也真是人生一大幸事.

sentences.en: If the bailiff thinks that things could turn nasty he will enlist the help of the police.
sentences.cn: 如果法警认为事情变得不可收拾，他就会寻求警方的帮助。

sentences.en: Neither judge nor bailiff is known there.
sentences.cn: 他们既不知道有审判官,也不知道有执法官.

sentences.en: Now I have a bailiff, a townsman ; he seems a practical fellow.
sentences.cn: 我现在用的总管是个城里人, 看起来倒是个很能干的小伙子.

sentences.en: Only a few go through the final humiliation of meeting the bailiff at the door.
sentences.cn: 很少有人经受执达官上门的奇耻大辱。
萨姆森是负责农场的管家.

sentences.en: The bailiff had a weakness for Michael, whom he had known from his bottle up.
sentences.cn: 管家偏爱迈克尔, 因为他从迈克尔吃奶的时候就认识他.

sentences.en: The bailiff was in charge of issuing a summons on the defendant.
sentences.cn: 法庭执行官负责向被告签发传票.

sentences.en: The bailiff was in charge of issuing a summons on the plaintiff.
sentences.cn: 法庭执达官负责向被告签发传票.

sentences.en: The court bailiff said jurors did not wish to speak to news media until the sentencing.
sentences.cn: 法院法警说，陪审员不想在宣判之前接受新闻媒体采访。

sentences.en: The master of the house is a bailiff, and he is very strict indeed.
sentences.cn: 屋主人是个法警, 他确实很严厉.

sentences.en: The summons was served by a bailiff.
Units of legal affairs: procurator, amanuensis, forensic physician, inspector, bailiff, investigator, rectification personnel, and guard.
sentences.cn: 四法务单位: 检察官 、 书记官 、 法医师 、 检验员 、 法警 、 调查人员 、 矫正人员及驻卫警.

sentences.en: Wu Hongyan is a single young woman who work as a bailiff in a regional court.
sentences.cn: 年轻的单身女性吴红燕是一位女法警,在地方法院工作.

words.tran_cn: [法]法警；执行官；区镇的地方长官

trans.tran_cn: 法警，执行官，低级地区行政官
trans.tran_en: an official of the legal system who watches prisoners and keeps order in a court of law
